name: Secret Bureau
description:
Secret Bureau is an exhilarating single-player, first-person adventure game available for both PC and Virtual Reality (PCVR Meta) in the same software package.

Players will navigate hostile territories, infiltrate enemy bunkers, disguise themselves, and engage with spies to thwart the nefarious plans of the Betalog Corporation. The game combines intense action with strategic gameplay, encouraging players to overcome a variety of challenges to achieve their mission.

Designed with a cinematic concept reminiscent of blockbuster franchises like “Mission: Impossible” and “007.”

name: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Deluxe Edition
description:
Obtain a variety of weapons and armor, including curiosities from a forgotten era with the Deluxe Edition. You’ll receive weapon and armor sets for the Warrior, Mage, and Rogue classes as well as armor sets and weapons for each of your 7 companions. That’s 3 armor sets for Rook, 6 weapons for Rook, 7 companion armor sets, and 7 companion weapons – saving Thedas never looked so good.

• 6 Weapon Appearances For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Warrior Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Mage Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Rogue Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 7 Weapon & 7 Armor Set Appearances For Companions. Cosmetic Only.

Enter the world of Thedas, a vibrant land of wilderness, treacherous labyrinths, and glittering cities – steeped in conflict and magics. Now, a pair of corrupt ancient gods have broken free from centuries of darkness and are hellbent on destroying the world.

Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods in Dragon Age: The Veilguard.

SAVE A BATTERED WORLD
Enter Thedas, a vibrant world of rugged wilderness, treacherous labyrinths and glittering cities. The world is teetering on a knife’s edge while corrupt gods unleash havoc across the continent. Nations war and factions splinter. Who will you trust? From the Arlathan Forest to the back alleys of Minrathous, this is a broken world. Your actions will affect the fate of Thedas forever.

UNITE THE VEILGUARD
Unite a team of seven companions, each with rich lives and deep backstories. These are characters to befriend, and even fall in love with. Among them, an assassin, a necromancer, a detective, each and all bringing their own expertise and unique abilities to the fight. You are never alone, decide who to take into battle and together face down demons, dragons and corrupt gods.

BECOME THE LEADER OTHERS BELIEVE IN
Select from different races and combat classes, customize your appearance, choose your character’s backstory and begin your journey as Rook, Dragon Age’s newest hero. The choice is yours. On your adventures, you’ll gain new abilities and discover unique, powerful artifacts to enhance your own combat style. Brace yourself, there are tough decisions to be made, allies to inspire, and a fight that needs every sword, staff and bow you can muster.

name: MLB Perfect Inning 24
description: Officially licensed MLB Baseball Game! Dive into an MLB live mobile baseball game, featuring the 2023 Willie Mays World Series MVP, Corey Seager! Experience the unique thrill of the real-time PvP baseball game in MLB Perfect Inning 24!

name: Bubble Bobble: Return of Great Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: Dairanto!! Mario Bros. DDX
description: Sin descripción

name: Blooper's Revenge DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. Mini
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeltroid
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Dudes
description: Sin descripción

name: Edmund
description: Sin descripción

name: Tasty Planet Dinotime
description: Control a tiny ball of grey goo with the ability to eat anything smaller than itself. The more it eats, the bigger it gets! After eating a time machine, you'll be sent back to the time of the dinosaurs. There are lots of tasty things to eat back then.

name: Warriors United
description: Warriors United is a cooperative action game for up to 4 players. You'll fight and progress through levels filled with increasingly powerful enemies and bosses. Useyour skills and allies to become even stronger in your battles.

name: Split Brain
description: Share the same body with a friend in Split Brain. One of you controls, the other one sees, but the decisions are made together! Face the illusion and uncover the truth to find your way out of Hexarture.

name: You
description:
I NEED TO TALK TO GOD.

After the sun murdered the moon, and her corpse flooded all the earth, YOU wants to talk to god to ask him one single question. You can transform into a gold statue, this form will help you advance your drowned world and find yourself in it.

Find the god of the sun before he finds you.

YOU is an abstract psychological-horror with driven narrative with puzzles aspects to

YOU features flashing images, artistic nudity, light gore, explicit language, as well as themes of abuse and suicide. The play session is around 45–60 minutes.

name: Coliseum
description: In Coliseum, you'll get the chance to train three young gladiators and transform them into seasoned veterans of the Coliseum circuit. You must deal with every aspect of being an arena manager, from the basics of training your warriors (and perhaps even enhancing their performance with body-altering potions) to disease and injury. Warriors age over time, and they even run the risk of getting in trouble outside the arena. Coliseum also features thousands of fighter combinations; uniquely generated news stories, injuries, and diseases; potion and spell effects; and a blow-by-blow combat system to ensure that each game is different.

name: Yoshi's Dreamer 2: Tropical Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitten Command
description: Kitten Command is a Mario fangame inspired loosely by Missile Command. You control a cat, wielding a gun, and need to stop agents of the Koopa Kingdom from invading your home! Originally developed as a "Secret Santa" present for someone on MFGG.

name: Cheerwine Deluxe 3
description: Prince Edward Island has been ripped out of the earth, and only Yoshi can save Canada from these vile forces!

name: Thunderbirds
description: Join Alan Tracy, an aspiring top-secret agent, and his friends on a quest to capture a master criminal. You'll control the Thunderbirds' fleet of highly advanced vehicles to travel across the globe and into outer space. In your missions, you'll visit International Rescue's secret island base, battle an oil well fire in Alaska, blast off to the Thunderbirds' space station, explore the bottom of the sea, and more. Race through dangerous terrain in Flight mode, and complete missions and solve puzzles in Adventure mode.

name: Big Oil: Build an Oil Empire
description: Big Oil leads you into times of the oil industry pioneers. Start your career in one of the historical scenarios or face the challenge of modern times. Found your very own company and lead it to the biggest oil imperium on earth. Whether in single-player or multiplayer, demonstrate your strategic ability to become the next "Anaconda" Rockefeller of the BIG OIL world. Build an oil empire. Turn crude to cash. Seventeen historical and modern scenarios from the beginning of the 20th Century until today. Challenging game modes such as historical scenarios, easy or advanced mode, single-player or multiplayer up to 6 players. Extra class graphics with the 3D-Oxygene-Engine. Over 300 different buildings and vehicles out of 3 centuries. Exact historical events such as earthquakes, wars and other catastrophes with direct influence on your company. Complex simulation of real cities like Los Angeles with job market, infrastructure and schools.

name: The Veil of the Forgotten
description: Sin descripción

name: Stars Reach
description: Stars Reach is a sandbox science-fantasy MMO where you explore deeply simulated living worlds in a shardless galaxy, fight aliens in action combat, and live in a fully player-driven economy full of peaceful ways to play. You and your friends can govern a planet!

name: Kahoro and Tetra
description:
A foreboding tower haunts the village. An evil witch resides there and she seems to have come out of nightmares in fairy tales. It is said she was searching for immortality, but she has not stepped out of the tower since eons ago. People have been disappearing and nobody knows exactly why. All they know is the witch did it.

Kahoro learns of this tale from their grandparents and believes the witch may have a cure for their peculiar illness. They run away from their home and enter the tower with the hope their nightmare will finally end.

But instead, a new dream begins. Kahoro meets Tetra, a doll and the ex-servant of the witch of the tower.

name: DCS World: F-86F Flaming Cliffs
description: F-86F Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-86F Sabre. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the plane and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline
description:
Welcome to Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline, an alternate history science fiction mod for Hearts of Iron 4.
Taking place in the wake of a failed American Revolution, the mod focuses on the substantial changes this causes in world history, compounded by the success of Nikola Tesla's Wireless Power Concept. The Victorian Era has been flash frozen by this advancement, creating an anarchic mix of the Jazz Age, Wellsian science fiction and transhumanism. The world is both familiar and utterly alien, and the mod seeks to explore that universe and provide a unique style compared to other overhaul mods.

name: Kaiserredux
description: KaiserreduX started out in late 2019 as a collection of various submods for Kaiserreich, later evolving into a unified submod turned fork and eventually - thanks to the continuous addition of new content, wider sweeping changes to lore and setting, and ever widening differences in design philosophies between the original base of the KR mod and KX - into a wholly separate entity that is in no way affiliated with KR beyond sharing the conceptual ideas for the timeline, albeit with many differences, and the base for the mod, so do not run the two mods together; KX is a standalone product. While KX has kept a considerable amount of pre-existing KR lore, much of which has changed by now, it has also introduced a lot of new elements and additions going beyond the scope of the timeline created back in the days of Kaiserreich for Darkest Hour.

name: Toshoshitsu no Neversista
description:
During a stormy summer night, a student met his death.

He left to take a picture of the rising waters in the river and never returned. All that was left of him were his belongings and the camera by the riverbank. Even after days of desperate searches, all anyone could find was one of his shoes.

In the end, he was treated as a casualty of the river...but soon other, sinister rumors of his death began to emerge. That the five friends who used to live in "The Haunted Tower" with him -- one of them, some of them, all of them -- may have had something to do with his cursed death.

Enter two people.

One, the student's older brother. He receives a mysterious letter about his brother's death, and as soon as he begins to investigate, he's hit by a blunt object and loses consciousness.

Only to wake up again in a dark room with five students surrounding him, interrogating him, and knowing that they will never let him leave...

Two, an idealistic assistant teacher who just arrived in town. He receives a cryptic warning from an intruder in his dorm, "The Haunted Tower," to "never think those five are children" -- the poor, sad, well-behaved five students who undeservedly suffer from bad rumors.

Caught between paranoia and the desire to trust his students, one day he finds a book titled "Neversista," which holds a startling truth...

name: EDYN
description: Join the battle for EDYN, the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Build settlements, command armies, and unify the realms in epic PvP warfare to etch your legacy into history.

name: Behind the Brush!
description: The main character, an art student new to University life, is having issues settling so they try to escape their daily life by telling a story through art. However, their emotions take a toll on this fictional world and the negative emotions manifest in this world as enemies and it's up to the main character to face and overcome them.

name: The Hallowed Garden
description:
On the eve of Halloween, Lil Ghostie is hard at work on his pumpkin patch. But this isn’t your normal pumpkin patch, no, this is a magical pumpkin patch. With help from Mayor Macabre, Lil Ghostie is sure to have enough pumpkins in time for this year’s Halloween Festival!

This cute, cozy farming sim is the perfect game to play this Halloween. Whether you want to collect every pumpkin, want to leave it running as a BRB screen, or want to play it on your stream with your community, you are sure to get your Halloween vibe fill.

name: ArgenMu
description:
Private MMORPG game. +20 years online!

ArgenMU seeks to give the best to lovers of this fabulous MMORPG-style adventure game.

We invite you to join a community with more than 20 years of experience. Whatever destination you choose, at ArgenMu we will always be with you and provide you with the support you need on your new adventures.

name: Cerulean Crescent
description:
The Tale of an Untamed Land
Ellerie sets sail for the Cerulean Crescent, a new frontier yet to be conquered by any nation. While she dreams of amassing wealth and power, this untamed land won’t be so kind to a newcomer. The bitter feuds between the settler factions may prove deadlier than the malevolent coast itself. The young captain must navigate a treacherous balance of interests to come out of this mess on top.

name: Bear No Grudge
description:
Take control of Bear and shoot, skate, race your way to justice across multiple locations in this action adventure game with a bite.

Bear no grudge is a grizzly action adventure game with bite.

In Bear No Grudge, players take control of a vengeful bear on a mission to take down the careless international delivery corporation, Forest Inc, that left his friend in a wheelchair. and destroying the planet This action-packed game features multiple locations, each with its own unique gameplay mechanics and challenges. Players will have to use their wits and quick reflexes to defeat enemies and bosses, while also navigating challenging environments on skateboards, hovercrafts and paws. As they progress, players can find hidden collectables to upgrade abilities to help them on their mission. With its diverse gameplay, Bear No Grudge offers a thrilling and satisfying gaming experience for anyone who enjoys fun. Set across 11 different levels you will pursue the evil CEO, Taking down hench men and a variety of baddies and leaving destruction in your path.

name: Zelda Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Camellia
description:
VS. Camellia is based around Camellia's music.

This mod adds brand new weeks featuring Camellia's character, numerous Camellia songs charted at 3 different difficulties, and more!

name: Mario Pong
description: Sin descripción

name: ﻿﻿The Flooded Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Jataí: The Bee
description: The Jataí is a native bee of the Atlantic Forest. It must fulfill its duty to pollinate flowers and collect pollen and nectar to feed the hive. During the mission, some enemies will appear: spiders hanging from their webs, lemon bees raiding the hive, and a large spider, the Queen, who must be stopped.

name: Gangstalk
description: GANGSTALK is a psychological horror game from the POV of your stalkers.

name: Missile Strike Imminent
description:
Missile strike imminent is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two, created by Ethosaur.

The Combine plan to launch a missile and unfortunately the Resistance know almost nothing about it, except its location. You task is to reach the base and then enter it. Once inside, stop that missile at all costs.

name: Mangút
description: Face the struggles of Gil, a tireless app delivery worker running against time to pay the bills. Swing across the platforms with a mechanical arm, dare to make tough decisions, and lead a revolution in Morro do Mangút.

name: Perino Candy Buster
description: Dive into the vibrant world of Perino Ball Buster, an action-packed arcade game that combines classic Block Breaker gameplay with a delightful twist! Join Porino and friends on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful graphics, engaging stories, and competitive local multiplayer.

name: Hunt Down the Freeman: 24 Hours
description:
A re-imagining of Hunt Down the Freeman made in 24 hours. This is a parody mod, so don’t take it seriously. Play sections taken from the original game.

If you haven’t played the original, this will contain spoilers for you.

name: Horrified Hector!
description: Horrified Hector! is a puzzle/exploration game for the Playdate, inspired by spooky kids cartoons and brain-scratching ice maze puzzles.

name: Spanky Attourney Ch.1
description:
This is a parody game of Ace Attourney by Capcom

Follow the path of a rookie lawyer, Winchester, and unravel the truth of a ( really small ) case, however if you fail, the punishment waiting for your client would be cruel and unforgiving.

name: Megaman Legends 1.5
description:
Megaman and Roll have picked up abnormally strong refractor signals deep below Merida Island.

Join them as they uncover the mystery underneath this bustling town!

name: Megaman Makeshift
description: Sin descripción

name: Megaman X and Zero: Training Missions
description: In the time between Megaman X3 and X4, witness the grueling training that prepare X and Zero for the next Maverick outbreak!

name: Senioritis
description:
Senioritis is a 2D retro-themed platformer about high school. Play as Julian "JD" Davenport and defeat his homework assignments! Watch out for neighborhood douchebag, Quince Vanderson!

Do you have what it takes to graduate?

name: Raion
description:
Raion is a momentum-based platformer with multiple paths to complete each stage. It’s a continuous runner with a twist:
Raion’s speed is determined by the environment. Going uphill? He’ll slow down. Running downhill? You better be ready for some speed.

name: ToriDori 2
description: TORIDORI 2 is the wonderful world of a photographer who is able to capture his dreams in the photo, but he can only take 2 shots per dream. The differences of some details will be the difference between these two shots. Carefully explore every corner and enjoy the game.

name: Sample Sonic
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn of Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: Classroom Whispers
description: Classroom Whispers immerses you in the dark hallways of an Argentine school during the night shift, where nothing is as it seems. You take on the role of a janitor who, in the midst of his solitary routine, begins to experience strange events: children appearing in empty classrooms, shadows watching you from the corners, and a growing sense that something is terribly wrong.

name: Super Pionero
description: Join Maxi and the other pioneers in the fantastic adventures of being an Explorer of the King. Where you should perform challenging actions and searches to collect as many stars as possible. But, I will not be so easy, you will be challenged by insects, snakes, arachnids, worms, bats and even the same evil.

name: Scuba in Aruba
description: "Scuba in Aruba" is an action arcade game where players guide a young scuba diver named Kenny on a quest to recover a stolen family relic. The relic was taken by pirates, broken into pieces, and scattered across various underwater locations. Players navigate through deep waters, encountering dangerous sea creatures and collecting treasures along the way.

name: Love Finds A Whey
description:
Which cheese will you take to the summer festival? And will you achieve your dream of becoming an artisanal cheesemaker?! Get ready for a romance that will make you melt.

"Love Finds A Whey" is a short parody dating sim.

name: Heart-Lung Machine
description:
HEART-LUNG MACHINE is a VR horror game designed to create an immersive and intense experience. Players find themselves in an abandoned underground complex, where they must navigate dark corridors with a dying flashlight, seeking items to survive. As they venture deeper, they uncover disturbing secrets about the facility’s past, all while avoiding a lurking presence.

The game’s AI operates autonomously, offering a dynamic challenge that requires stealth to evade detection. Realistic hiding mechanics let players physically crouch behind objects, crawl into shafts, slide under tables, or hide in lockers.

Features:
- Autonomous, AI-driven monster
- Realistic hiding mechanics
- Randomized elements
- Hardcore survival horror
- Dark, unsettling themes

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - A Treacherous Adventure
description: A Treacherous Adventure is a free new content update for Warhammer: Vermintide 2 containing a two-part adventure.

name: Jasmine
description: Jasmine was originally announced in 2011, but was cancelled in 2015. However, in 2024, it was announced that development would resume.

name: Breadbox
description: Breadbox is a fascinating retro computer simulator that allows you to step back in time and experience the magic of machines from the 70s and 80s. In this visual environment, you can interact with hardware and old media as if they were real.

name: Finnish Cabin Mayhem: Mökkimähinä
description: Alcohol. Action. Violence. Get ready to take your friends "behind the sauna" using whatever there is at hand.

name: Lu[Idle]
description: Lu[Idle] is an Idle/Clicker game where you play as a game developer making games to become the best game developer ever. Watch out for the rival game developer as he try's to stop you.

name: Fatal Frame
description:
Fatal Frame is an enhanced port of the original PS2 game. It includes the following upgrades and additions:

- A new ending
- 11 new ghosts
- New unlockable costumes
- A new difficulty level
- Graphical upgrades

name: Old World Blues
description: Old World Blues is a total overhaul for Hearts of Iron IV: starting in the year 2275 and set in the Fallout universe. Experience the post-apocalypse like never before with a dynamic war system that ensures that the AI nations act on their own, respond to aggression, and strike when their opponents are weak. Forty seven national focus trees—ten of which are generic—keep the game exciting as numerous powers contest in a battle to control the Wasteland. With the use of “Historic Focuses”, you get to decide the path famous Fallout factions took, directing generic nations, and changing history as you see fit.

name: Godspeed: A Flame for Winter
description: Godspeed: A Flame for Winter is a Hearts of Iron IV total overhaul mod focused around a wildly divergent alternate history and an emphasis on storytelling. In Godspeed, you fight not over revanchism, ideologies, or which version of Germany won which version of World War I, but over you and your faction's grand plan for the world after the war is over.

name: The Fire Rises
description:
It is 2020. The world holds it’s breath as a newly discovered coronavirus disease spirals out of control, and spreads like wildfire worldwide. Economies plunge into another recession, societies further radicalize, and worst of all, political instability is on the rise. Surely nothing worse could happen, right?
With the collapse of Saudi Arabia into civil war, the Coronavirus Pandemic, and the nationwide riots against police brutality, at a scale worse than the 1992 LA riots, the United States of America is facing it’s darkest hour. It’s collapse is inevitable, and the world balance is at stake. With the death of the American Hegemony, her modern rivals eye their historic territories with an unfound vigor.

name: Battle Spirits CrossOver
description: Battle Spirits CrossOver is a digital card video game developed and published by FuRyu.

name: Negative Reverie
description:
Negative Reverie is a retro-handheld-inspired RPG about technology, violence and animal intelligence... or the lack thereof.

Face the darkest side of Corporate America with Vuota, a young woman with a natural talent for violence, a hacksaw, and a mission to take down the CEO of the FamilyTech Corporation. With the right skills, tactics, outfits and allies, she might be able to overcome the oppression of modern technology culture... and possibly discover something even darker waiting below...

name: Angel
description: ANGEL imbues breakbeats with networked aesthetics in this rhythm/racing adventure. In a network devastated by digital climate change, what does it mean to be connected?

name: How to Build a Flying City
description: When tasked to build a flying city, it's up to you to rake in all the money you'll need! Recruit travelers and adventurers to help your city flourish!

name: The Legacy of Lunatic Omsk
description: This visual novel based on the events of the 15th installment of the Touhou Project, but the plot changes everything into Russian realities. Playing as Marisa Kirisame, you embark on a journey with one of your 3 friends: Reimu, Reisen or Sanae.

name: River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next
description: In this second part of River City Saga: Three Kingdoms, our beloved hot-blooded high-schooler from River City, Kunio (Guan Yu) charges his way through to the apex chapter of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the Battle of Wuzhang Plains. Experience a comedic twist on the classic tale, featuring a cast of over 100 characters!

name: An Unnamed Jumping Game
description: Short Platformer about Jumping

name: Rolling Ex.tre.me
description: Street luge arcade game by Galeco in which you slide down a mountain against other competitors in an illegal race.

name: Infinity Slime Dungeon
description: Infinity Slime Dungeon is an Idle RPG roguelite where you guide Jeffrey the Slime on his quest for freedom! Face off against 15 unique enemies in endless waves, collecting souls from each victory to upgrade Jeffrey’s stats and abilities. After every battle, you’ll make a crucial choice: restart and strengthen Jeffrey further with his earned souls, or forge ahead to the next foe, risking it all for greater rewards. Push Jeffrey to new heights—or depths—in his escape!

name: Ships 3D
description:
Ships 3D is a .io style ships game with 2 Game modes: Team Flags and Trader. It has many aspects of progression including the Session Leaderboard (Shown in the top right while playing), WOF (Wall of Fame), and the Clan Leaderboard.

The game was made and developed by a solo indie developer known as Yp3d with contributions from Zorm.

name: Free Fall
description: Navigate in zero-g to retrieve your spacecrafts lost data disks.

name: Magicka 2: Three Cardinals Robe Pack
description: Three full Robe sets suitable for Wizards that want to look really cool, hot or just like a Samurai!

name: Magicka 2 Upgrade Pack
description: Includes: Warlord Robe Set, Cultist Robe Set, Digital Interactive Map, and Magicka Orchestra Soundtrack

name: Magicka 2 Complete Collection
description: The Complete Collection includes the base game, Deluxe Edition content and all DLCs.

name: Project Kizuna
description: Announced during the Great Aquaplus Festival 30th Anniversary, it is a new RPG written by Suga Munemitsu, the creator of Utawarerumono.

name: Zhi Huan Wang: Shou Bu Qu
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Fighters Blitz
description: Sin descripción

name: My Little Sister Callie
description: My Little Sister Callie is a visual novel about a brother helping his little sister to adapt to life outside of a refugee camp. How far will you go to bring her home?

name: 5 Card Slingo
description: Are you ready to play 12 hands of poker at once!? 5 Card Slingo is the exciting game that combines the fast paced fun of Slingo with strategic poker playing action. It features 3 modes of game play, including the brand new Mixed Matrix, which lets you put the cards anywhere! It also saves your best hand in each mode, keeps track of your top scores and has a top ten list to highlight all of the big winners. Do you have what it takes to be one of them? Play 5 Card Slingo today and get lucky!

name: Fight Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: All Grown Up Krazy Karts
description: Choose your favorite All Grown Up character, hop in a souped-up kart and put the pedal to the metal on custom tracks packed with twists, turns, jumps and power-ups galore! Choose from three custom tracks, power-ups include super speed, slime cannon and more. Features super fast-pace and realistic racing physics.

name: Designed for Danger
description: Designed for Danger is a story-driven Portal 2 campaign (PTI map series). It consists of eight levels that provide players with one to two hours of playtime. It mixes regular puzzle chambers with story moments and exploration sections.

name: Nightmare Shift
description: Nightmare Shift is a psychological horror game that follows a female protagonist who starts a new job as a motel receptionist, only to find her life spiraling into a dark and mysterious reality. As she questions her sanity, she must uncover the truth behind the eerie and abnormal events around her.

name: Super Big Bro Quest
description: Join the squire Louie in an epic 3D bullet hell infinite runner! Conquer the skies, defeat the Skull King, and rule as the righteous leader.

name: Echoes of Vision
description: Echoes of Vision is set in Cold Mountain, a city with an enigmatic atmosphere characterized by brutalist architecture reminiscent of the Cold War era. Strange occurrences with supernatural origins are not uncommon in the city, often caused by elusive entities beyond human comprehension.

name: Can We Start Over?
description: Sin descripción

name: Select Oblige
description: Select Oblige is the latest title from the popular Japanese visual novel brand Madosoft. It features character design and artwork by renowned illustrator Hiyo Yuzuna, with the story crafted by Shoukei Wakaba. The main heroines are voiced by Hana Akino, Kanau, Ren Sagami, and Yuuka Nanakusa.

name: Adoventoro Tcheco
description: A rom hack of Kero Kero Keroppi no Daibouken 2: Donuts Ike ha Oosawagi in giving rise to the now famous character Tcheco.

name: Todos Contra Tcheco
description: Sin descripción

name: Hawken Skate Boarder
description: Sin descripción

name: Hawk Tuah Run
description: Score points by using your special ability on microphones as you race ahead. The levels accelerate, testing your reflexes and skills. Every run is a thrilling experience.

name: CBeebies Playtime Island: Game
description:
CBeebies Playtime Island is full of free games for children, it’s safe, fun and kids can play offline with their favourite CBeebies friends.

The games in this fun kids app encourage learning through play with CBeebies favourites, Hey Duggee, JoJo & Gran Gran, Shaun the Sheep, Love Monster, Go Jetters, Swashbuckle, Peter Rabbit, Bing, Octonauts, Teletubbies, Mr Tumble and more.

name: My Very Hungry Caterpillar
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate – Project Re-Rainbow
description:
Project Re-Rainbow is a mod for Sonic Colors: Ultimate, with a primary focus on restoring the visual elements to better match the original Sonic Colors' art direction on the Wii, especially in regards to the colors and lighting.

In addition to these visual improvements, Project Re-Rainbow also offers fully remastered cutscenes, along with audio and bug fixes, improving upon the overall gameplay experience.

name: Remute: Technoptimistic
description: Technoptimistic is a techno album made by Hamburg-based Remute, released for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Remute: The Cult Of Remute
description: The Cult of Remute is the tenth music album made by Hamburg-based Remute, released for the Super Nintendo.

name: Remute: Electronic Lifestyle
description: Electronic Lifestyle is the eleventh music album made by Hamburg-based Remute, released for the PC Engine/Turbografx-16.

name: Remute: The Cult of Remute Portable
description: A port of The Cult of Remute for the Nintendo DS.

name: Remute: Living Electronics
description: Remute enters the most popular portable game console of all time - the Game Boy! His new album 'Living Electronics' comes exclusively as a cartridge for Nintendo's evergreen handheld and contains 15 new songs full of bleepy bliss.

name: Remute: Electronic Deathstyle
description: Electronic Deathstyle is a well-balanced collection of 16 brand new songs and remixes for the PC Engine CD/TurboGrafx CD that makes this the perfect companion to this year's previously released PC-Engine/TG-16 and Game Boy albums 'Electronic Lifestyle' and 'Living Electronics'.

name: Remute: R64
description:
After releasing highly acclaimed cartridge music albums for the Sega Genesis, SNES, PC Engine and Game Boy, the German musician Remute is now once again coming up with a true novelty: 'R64' is the first ever music album released as a Nintendo 64 cartridge!
It is Remute's most diverse and playful album so far and contains 15 brand new songs ranging from ultra-catchy electro-pop reminiscent of Yello, Kraftwerk, or Yellow Magic Orchestra to sinister techno and house excursions beaming you right back to foggy 90s warehouse raves.

name: Hellfire
description: In Hellfire the player plays a "basher" in the early 1980s - a "basher" is a railway enthusiast who seeks to ride behind as many different locomotives as possible. At the start of the game, the player is given a randomly-generated list of locomotives that have not been travelled behind, and scores points by filling out this list, gaining more points by riding behind rarer locomotives. The game ends after an in-game week, but the points earned can be used in future games to buy tickets for rarer services such as sleeper trains. The game includes the entirety of the British Rail network at the time, with locomotives assigned based on the real-life timetables.

name: Remute: Unity
description: Right after R64, the first Nintendo 64 cartridge music album ever made, Remute is back with his next album: Unity comes as a Gameboy Advance cartridge and features 15 brand new songs about unification, division and trust.

name: Remute: Generations
description: After releasing albums for the Nintendo 64 and Gameboy Advance, Remute's third (!) album in 2022 comes for Sega Dreamcast and ends the year with maximum 128-bit power! Generations features 15 brand new songs and stunning visuals by Duranik - developer of the shoot 'em up game 'Sturmwind'.

name: Remute: Decoder
description: Remute is kicking off 2023 with an ambitious, longtime dream project - a Sega Genesis / Mega Drive adaption of the german counter-cultural cyberpunk cult movie Decoder!

name: Remute: There Is Hope
description: Within only five years Remute became the trailblazer for game cartridge based music albums delivering releases for consoles like Super Nintendo, Gameboy, Sega Genesis, Nintendo 64 and many more. In 2024 he is increasing the niche force even further and surprises us with the very first music album for Atari’s ill-fated, but immensly powerful Jaguar – the first 64-bit gameconsole ever released back in 1993.

name: Remute: Remute 3D
description:
Are you ready to dive into peak 'multimedia'? With TIME magazine's '1993 product of the year'? Wanna play with the... 3DO?! After just releasing There Is Hope for the Atari Jaguar this year, Remute goes even more niche and already comes up with his next interactive music album Remute 3D exclusively for the 3DO.

Remute 3D contains 15 brand new tracks ranging from psychedelic techno trance bliss to adventurous, spaced-out new wave electro-pop. It is showcasing once more Remute's versatility and lust for experimenting while staying true to his 90s electronica and rave roots. Meet Remute in a realtime 3D-environment, watch full motion video, play a game or just simply listen to some tunes - yes, this is multimedia in full effect!

name: Remute: Dreammachine
description: After highly acclaimed and unique game console albums for SNES, Mega Drive, Jaguar, N64, Gameboy or even 3DO, the German electronic music producer Remute presents his most ambitious work to date: Together with his long-standing cooperator and amazing graphic artist Alien^PDX he created Dreammachine - a full CGI feature film inviting you to a deep dream journey filled to the brim with psychedelic sequences, epic animations and a strangely meditative ambient soundtrack.

name: The Fairly OddParents: Big Superhero Wish
description: Click through the pages of a living comic book and zap the villains back where they belong!

name: Avante! Atlantis
description: Avante! Atlantis is a turn-based tactical game where the rise of Atlantis triggers a fierce global race for it's domination. Lead your nation through the ever-changing, mythical city, battling foes and uncovering the secrets that kept Atlantis hidden for centuries.

name: Fly-High and Huggy: Unstoppable
description: The easier version of Fly-High and Huggy for younger kids transitioning into CBBC, on the CBeebies website

name: Fly-High and Huggy: Unstoppable
description: The harder version of Fly-High and Huggy for older kids transitioning away from CBeebies, on the CBBC website

name: Alchemical Keyboard
description: Play through an interactive music video where you modify the world around you using alchemy in order to progress through the song!

name: Bowser's Last Stand
description: Sin descripción

name: Lancen Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Dangerous World 2
description:
Sequel of Dangerous World and events of the HL2: Episode Two. We'll see how Frank Harrison deals with it.

Although, DW2 full version was scheduled to be released in 2011, only a playable demo version was released on October 2010, which contains two maps for DW 2. Players were advised to observe their vicinity carefully - sometimes even a small detail can show them the right direction or tell them what to do.

name: The Last Nurse Joy
description: In Pokémon, when battles don’t swing in your favor or the journey becomes too grueling, the Nurse Joys and their peculiar machines are always there to ensure the game continues seamlessly. Transforming a Pokémon from a state of injury to complete stability might seem like sorcery. Yet, this magic is seldom questioned. But remember, even magic has its origins. There was a time when this miraculous machine was non-existent, and somewhere, a Nurse Joy was the last to receive it.

name: Nights: Realm of Dreams
description: Nights: Realm of Dreams is a Tech Demo for a Nights game in full 3D. the game explores this concept with new elements to fit the 3rd dimension while keeping the core appeal of Nights Into Dreams. choose from 4 children of courage to help Nights Protect Nighttopia from the Nightmaren's chains.

name: Yachoukitan
description:
Having lost his memory, Sera Kaoru stops in the forest and visits a strange Western-style house.
Guided by the house's owner, the boy in clothes of black, he descends the long spiral staircase to the basement.
There sits a pure white maiden.Crimson eyes and white skin---a breathtakingly beautiful "girl."
Sera's job is to distract her from her boredom.
He reads a fairytale to her, and upon completing the peaceful job, the boy in black clothes informs him.
She is the "ChouTsuki," and Sera was invited to the mansion to be the ChouTsuki's "sacrifice."

name: Sonic: The Murdering Insanity
description: Sonic The Murdering Insanity is a RPG Horror Sonic game. With chases, complex boss fights and voice acting.

name: Tentacles Invasion
description: On the way back to Earth, the space freighter Nostromo 2 encounters an emergency, and crew member Veronica Wenger is awakened from cryosleep. The ship is infested with mysterious creatures, and there is no communication with the other 9 crew members. In response to the computer "HOLLY9000," Veronica embarks on a mission to save her fellow crewmates.

name: Trivia About You
description:
"Trivia About You" is a romance visual novel about furry characters sharing meaningful moments in Carol’s House.

After moving into the shop, you become roommates with three charming furry characters. Through daily life, from spring to autumn, you slowly build deeper connections with them.

name: Altered
description: Altered is a trading card game from French publisher Equinox. It has a focus on exploration instead of combat, and 1:1 digital ownership, which can be used to play the game in its entirety (via official license/partnership) on Board Game Arena.

name: Tokyo Satsujinki Gakkou no Kaidan
description:
In a Japan where Amaterasu (good/happiness) and Aramatsuri (evil/misfortune) powers are contained within humans. The main character, Yuzuru Kurotori, is a civil servant working for the Tokyo Metropolitan Government. He belongs to the Aramatsuri Countermeasures Sector on the 7th Floor of the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building.

Only those who can see and stand toe to toe with Aramatsuri belong to this department. Even in modern Japan, the Aramatsuri wander the streets of Tokyo…

name: Microbial Sector
description:
Microbial Sector is a short, experimental first-person horror game

It's your first day as a lifeform researcher, and while you don’t know much about the job, you're desperate for the paycheck. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Seeing Red
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow's Ladder
description:
What is real and what is not? Explore the mysterious island where Shadow the Hedgehog wakes up. Destroy the G.UN. robots, find the keys, open the doors, and prepare to face something darker and mystical.
Shadow's Ladder is experimental light horror game, influenced by old school games. This is an attempt to mix the 2D style of Sonic games with the dark atmosphere of Japanese horror games.

name: Sonic Metallix
description: Sin descripción

name: Damashi Game
description: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.

name: Looking Glass
description:
Looking Glass is a free RPG horror-esque exploration game made with WOLF RPG Editor released in 2019.
It features a 4-chapter story centering Aoi Yuuta, who experiences reoccurring nightmares taking place in a different world. However, things begin to change with the appearance of someone with almost the exact same face as him.

name: Land of the Vikings: Thralls
description: This new content adds a new strategic layer, with thrall management! Capture defeated enemies as thralls and assign them tasks to boost your settlement's efficiency. Keep your thralls happy and healthy, and witness their stories unfold.

name: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut
description: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains an entire new story with new characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, a little bit memey, or just not correct. With over 130 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh this mod is essentially a new game. This mod is not meant to be taken too seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh and creative for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

name: Narrow Woods Hotel
description: A retro point-and-click horror adventure game that tests the boundries of the genre! In this "found-footage" horror game you have to navigate the rooms and hallways of the mysterious Narrow Woods Hotel. Collect keys and items and use them to find your way out.

name: Viscera Cleanup Detail 2
description: On the 26th of February 2024 it was announced that RuneStorm was "confident that we have more than enough material for a sequel and lots of interesting improvements to add".

name: Half Life But The
description: Coming to you live, it's real, they put hlvrai in undertale.

name: Superhex.io
description: Conquer as much territory as possible by drawing shapes and connecting back to your territory. Don't let enemies cut your tail or it's over!

name: Super Pocket: Technōs Edition
description:
The Super Pocket is a series of handheld game console.

The Technōs Edition contains the following games:

- Block Out
- Crash 'n' the Boys: Street Challenge (NES)
- The Combatribes
- Double Dragon
- Double Dragon (GB)
- Double Dragon (NES)
- Double Dragon II: The Revenge
- Double Dragon 3: The Rosetta Stone
- Minky Monkey
- Mysterious Stones: Dr John's Adventure
- Renegade
- River City Ransom (NES)
- Super Dodge Ball
- Super Double Dragon (SNES)
- Super Spike V'Ball (NES)

name: Terrors Of North: Finnish Cabin
description: You think you're in luck for getting a cabin for such a good price but you will soon find out why the previous owner wanted to get rid of it. Will you survive the Finnish Cabin experience?

name: El Séquito de Leonor de Aquitania
description: Sin descripción

name: It's A Farmer Thing
description: In It's A Farmer Thing, you purchase a peaceful island. Raise animals, tend to crops, mine for resources, or pick apples – all without any pressure. Play solo or with friends. The game offers a laid-back, humorous atmosphere, Base Building and supports all languages with customizable language files.

name: Robinson Crusoe
description: As Robinson Crusoe, a 17th-century castaway, you must survive on a tropical island in this action-adventure game. Explore a dynamic world, uncover secrets, craft tools, build shelters, and defend against dangers. Your choices shape your fate—will you conquer the wilds or fall victim to them?

name: Irem Collection: Volume 2
description:
A retro port collection of classic Irem titles.
Air Duel
GunForce
GunForce 2

Published by ININ

name: Breeze Contest
description: The Breeze Contest is a massive Celeste project featuring the largest lobby in the game’s history, with development spanning three months and map creation taking just over one month. This autumn-themed lobby includes 75 unique beginner maps, a Heartside, 200+ strawberries, custom code, extensive custom sprite work, a beautiful endscreen by Fuwamo, and original music. However, using debug tools may cause issues within the lobby or maps. To fully enjoy the mod, make sure to download the Breeze Contest Audio Pack, which is required for some features to work. Enjoy the journey through these beginner-friendly maps!

name: Coloring Game 5
description: Coloring Game 5 - coloring by numbers. Is a bright representative of anti-stress games.

name: Coloring Game 5.1
description:
An additional set of images for Coloring Game 5.

Size: 25 images / 500,000 px.
Duration: 15 hours (Pen Mode) / 8 hours (Fill Mode)

name: The Zium Exposition
description:
The Zium Exposition is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

High in the Zwitz Alps, visit the foundational Zwitzerland Okkozium; the historic central pavilion of The Grand Expo. Ride the Okkozium Exposition Ropeway through the vaulting tunnels of Mount Okkozium, arriving at The Archival Plateau, high above Zwitzerland. There, you will ride the Expo Elevator down towards The Okkozium where 45 artists have assembled to tell the story of The Zium Exposition.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants
description: Live the adventure with the Premium Edition to receive Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Story DLC*.

name: DCS World: F-5E Flaming Cliffs
description: F-5E Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-5E Tiger II. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the F-5E and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: The Japanese Calligraphy
description: A Japanese Calligraphy Simulator Game! Not only can you practice writing with a brush following examples, but you can also practice writing hiragana and katakana! Self-scoring kanji tests! Grateful sutra copying! Let's study Japanese!

name: Sethi and the Inca Wizard
description: la Qoyä, the wife of the emperor is dying from a strange curse. This is no surprise you will help. As Sethi, and with your companion Pepi, you decide to investigate to defeat the enemies of the Empire. You will have to explore places such as Cuzco, Lake Titicaca, the Mountain of the Spirits, the Temple of the Sun, and so on, talk to people, find and use items. Since this game is educational, you will learn about the culture of the Incas.

name: L'Odyssée Sibérienne: Le Rêve Utile de Nicolas Vanier
description: A french game about Nicolas Vanier siberian odyssee

name: In the Name of the Tsar
description: This mod is an overhaul of Hearts of Iron IV and takes place in alternate timeline where Russia, after the Brusilov's offensive manages to break through the Austrian defenses taking out Austria Hungarian Empire from the war. Germany, fearing complete destruction of their Empire sued for peace later in the beginning of 1917.

name: Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War
description: Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War, an overhaul mod for Hearts of Iron IV, puts you in the position of one of the countries of the world in World War One's time period. In an era where the stakes were high and risks even higher, you'll have to tread lightly when it comes to diplomacy. A single mistake or a single bluff gone too far could mean the deaths of millions.

name: Swords and Sandals Crusader
description: Brandor erupts into chaos and war as the realm's greatest heroes and villains take to the battlefield. Lay siege to castles in the pouring rain or send your cavalry against a horde of skeletons in the heat of the scorching desert. This is a turn based strategy game in the style of Defender of the Crown, featuring army combat and management, a simple RPG progression system and a special 'Survival mode' which pits you against your foes one after the other. Control giant iron robots, fifty foot high demons and great apes and shake the very foundations of Brandor. Put on your sandals again and become the finest crusader in the realm!

name: Project Borealis: Prologue
description: Project Borealis: Prologue is a fan-made game which expands on the classic episodic series by Valve Software. Return to a snow covered Ravenholm and experience the iconic town reimagined in an arctic atmosphere and modern graphics.

name: Legend of the Mana Sword
description:
Legend of the Mana Sword focuses on making the first game of the Mana series both a better experience for first time players, and more fun for returning players.
If you’ve never played a Mana game before, Legend of the Mana Sword is a good place to start your adventure.
If you’ve already played later Mana games, it will be familiar yet new.
If you’ve previously played the original (whether it was called Final Fantasy Adventure, Mystic Quest, or Seiken Densetsu) then Legend of the Mana Sword helps the game you remember better live up to its true potential.

name: Fat Boy Raids The Cookie Factory
description: Fat Boy Raids The Cookie Factory is a retro-style game where players guide a cookie-craving character named Fat Boy through a series of challenging levels inside a cookie factory. The goal is to collect as many treats as possible while dodging factory guards and obstacles. With simple controls, the game combines arcade action with puzzle-solving.

name: Abducted Toad 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Oda a un Bocadillo de Queso
description: Sin descripción

name: Typical Mario Game 1/8
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinite Run One
description: Infinite Run One is a non-ending jump-n-run survival game where you simply tap on the screen to control the character.

name: Cops
description: Sin descripción

name: Wake Up Before You Get Killed, Minions!
description: The player controls Bowser, who is in a rope conveyor belt. In the left side of the screen is a orange pipe, which let's out Goomba's and Toad's. Bowser can roar and wake them up, where waking up a Goomba will earn him a point while waking up a Toad doesn't do anything. If the Toad's fall in the lava, Bowser will earn a point while letting the Goomba's fall into the lava will cost Bowser a life. Hazards occasionally show up, most of which can make Bowser lose a life in contact.

name: Fish Sticks
description: Sin descripción

name: Target Strikers: Deadly Dart
description: Target Strikers: Deadly Dart is a puzzle game made by Mors and Shell Master Tortwag with high definition graphics using Game Maker 8. This game is the sequel for Deadly Dart.

name: Burritos
description: Burritos (or Mario in Mexico el Game) is Supernova's first attempt on making a jokegame. It is a short game that features Mexicans and a mixture of good and bad graphics.

name: Lelu
description:
Get your gears in motion for a captivating monochromatic adventure where you play as Lelu, a small but determined clockwork toy who has gained consciousness and found a taste for freedom!

Navigate your way through the toy factory, a labyrinthian tower filled with puzzles and traps set by the factory’s eccentric guardian. Use your wits and agility to overcome challenges, from conveyor belts and electrifying circuits to sentient toys and towering toy titans.
As you delve deeper into the world, uncover hidden abilities to aid you in your quest, alongside a variety of secrets and other toys sharing your desire for freedom.

Will you find your way to the elusive exit, or will you just be another toy on the shelf?

name: Hidden Pass Skirmishes
description: Chart a course for mystical adventure in this fusion of Tactical Turn-Based RPG and Strategy. This is a small tactical adventure where you have to choose one of four groups of heroes and challenge three different groups of opponents. Starting with an easy group of enemies and ending with strong one.

name: Ultima Underworld: The Stygian Abyss
description: The PlayStation port of Ultima Underworld I, released exclusively in Japan, features a number of enhancements and changes from the original, including new 3D polygonal graphics, a new controls and tweaked game play optimized for the console, remixed soundtrack and new video intro.

name: No Strangers
description: An online horror game of exploration, teamwork and betrayal for 3-15 players.

name: The Damn Psychiatric
description: The "San Lucas" psychiatric hospital, which was built in 1985 to help people with mental illnesses, became the scene of crimes and suspicious experiments in the year 2035. Patients mysteriously disappeared and some were found found dead in a strange way.

name: The Fox Hare Disaster: Chapter One
description: Prepare to explore an abandoned mall from the 90’s in this first-person, psychological horror! Tackle puzzles and come face to face with the haunting creatures that lurk inside. Will you be able to make it out alive, or will you suffer the same fate as those who came before you…?

name: Duolingo
description:
Duolingo is a gamified language learning app, which works using the spaced repetition technique. In order to keep the learner engaged, Duolingo has leaderboards, daily objectives and rewards like badges, items, its own currency and experience points.

As September 24th, 2024, Duolingo added a new lesson type called "Adventures", in which you can control one of Duolingo's mascots, while answering questions to make the scene play out.

name: Layup Legends
description: The basket-brawler for up to 4 players! Use your skills to outplay your opponents on a variety of stages. Unleash powerful super moves to destroy your enemies and become a Layup Legend. Play with your friends or CPUs in 1v1 and 2v2 matches locally or online.

name: Battle in the Future
description: Sin descripción

name: Toads vs. Koopas: Bowser's Conquest
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Country
description: Sin descripción

name: Plumber's Parasitic Plant Problem
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Castle Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: The Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: 808: Firetower12
description: You are Max. A 17 year old that has just graduated from school. Your mother want's you to get a job. You search endlessely but the luck just isn't on your side. Until one day. You have been accepted as a Fire lookout. A week later, you head out.

name: Cursed Companions
description: Cursed Companions is a co-op horror game where what you say can save or sabotage your team. The game is always listening — say the right words, and you can cast spells or disable traps and unlock rewards. Say the wrong words and you and your teammates will get hurt.

name: Heroes of History
description: Mobile game with city building and developing Heroes for battles.

name: Yeonghon Gibyeong Lazenca
description: Sin descripción

name: Kaidan of Rules: Shengya Community
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinchimono: The Videogame
description: Sin descripción

name: Viscera
description: Viscera is an arcade-inspired, gleefully excessive top-down shooter. Fight through the muck and gore against the mutant menace. Master over 50 weapons and more than 80 abilities. Prove you’re the best at withstanding the horde until the end takes you. Viscera awaits. Soak in it.

name: Hanahime no Kuni
description: Sin descripción

name: Supra Mayro Bross: Legend of the Lost Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Floodcore
description: Floodcore is a puzzle adventure game in which you explore an ancient civilization in a flooded world, and discover a mysterious power to overcome the temple's challenges.

name: Myrmica
description: Myrmica is an investigation and puzzle adventure viewed from an isometric perspective. Explore a petrol station while chased by a time anomaly. Manipulate the routines of 5 unique characters to achieve your goal, create your situations trapped in a time loop, and uncover the truth of Complex B13B.

name: Torchr Runners: Demastered
description: It's an online co-op indie, runner 3d platformer with a bit of puzzle and surreal. "Carry your flickering torch through perilous puzzles in this retro-inspired cooperative platformer. Work together to keep your sanity intact, beat mind-bending challenges, and survive the misanthropic taunts of the "Torcherer" – all while racing against time before your light runs out!"

name: Jermle
description: A word guessing game where you can guess "Jerma". Finally!

name: Super Mario XP: Remastered
description:
"Super Mario XP: Remastered" is a restoration project of a 2001 fan-game called "Super Mario XP".
Originally developed by a japanese with the nickname of CnC Darkside back in 2001, Super Mario XP mix both Mario and Castlevania mechanics. Making a cool and original playstyle with it.

Play through the original 7 stages and find new secrets and levels added to the game.

name: Amy's Rascal Race
description:
Amy’s Rascal Race is fan made spinoff starring Amy Rose! Join Amy as she is spirited away to a mysterious uncharted island by a mysterious gemstone. During her ride, her exposure to the gemstone grants her new ballerina twirling abilities! She is joined by a new foxy buddy where they together with their new ballerina abilities must traverse this island in this new silly 2.5 platformer!

Here you will find that ballerina twirling is not only pretty but deadly to your foes, you will also find that it can also help spin you far and wide and traverse great heights! twirl on walls and ceilings, or twirl off of walls and ramps! Twirl to solve problems and overcome challenges! You better get going then! you will need to twirl to the peak of the island to solve why you were called there!

name: Sonic Ringworlds
description: Sonic Ringworlds is planned to be an SA1-like Sega Saturn homebrew game.

name: Sonic Kick
description: Sonic Kick is a Sonic fangame inspired by the Advance and Rush series, meant to be the combination of Rush's adrenaline-fueling speed and Advance's momentum-oriented origins, all built from the ground up.

name: Sonic Revisited
description: Sonic Revisited is a new take on recreating the first Sonic game from scratch.

name: Sonic Hoshi
description: Sonic Hoshi is a 2D fan game that fits in-between the story of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and 3.

name: Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Attack of the Goofy Ahh Bandicoots!
description: Sin descripción

name: The Acorn Bounty
description: Help Samson the Squirrel battle his way through peril, as he tracks down what was ruthlessly stolen from him. Adventure through the forest battling your way through a variety of critters, unlocking cosmetic hats, completing the beastiary, and claiming what's rightfully yours.

name: Crash Bash Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Emerald Fighters
description: Sin descripción

name: Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel
description:
Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel is an ARENA BRAWLER in which up to eight teams battle against each other with characters from the Sonic The Hedgehog series. Each team is given four 'emeralds' that represent badniks that will fight in an arena during each round.

You must win rounds to score points for your team, which are used to purchase upgrades or randomize your badniks so that they have higher strength or health stats, and sometimes gain special fighting abilities that give them a distinct advantage over other monsters in the arena. There are also special mini games between rounds where players on each team must fight each other.

name: Chao Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Creature Oasis
description: Sin descripción

name: Forecursed
description:
Survive:
You and a bunch of other inmates must go purge your death sentence on Earth, a cursed and abandoned planet. Teleport to a chosen location and be the last one standing to clear your sentence. Keep an eye on your oxygen meter and use the tools at your disposal, but most of all, stay away from the curse.

Curse:
If you receive the curse, your goal is to get rid of it before it consumes your soul. You are now the hunter and must catch one of your fellow prisoners. Lie and confuse others to approach them, or go for the chase and outrun your victim. The curse has given you otherworldly abilities that let you leap far in the air, see others through walls and hear their heartbeats. Use those to your advantage and don't stay cursed for too long.

Ghouls:
Death isn't the end. The curse has now consumed your soul and you can now take on the forms of different ghouls to torment the remaining prisoners. Crawl, fly or run, different ghouls will give you different ways to traverse the environment and attack the prisoners. Figure out each ghoul's best strategies and work with the cursed prisoner to spread as much chaos as possible.

name: OverKnights
description: Step into the heart of PvP Arena battles where every victory counts in this f2p Card Battler. Test your skills and prove you’re worthy of reaching the top as you customize your OverKnight with powerful Parts and Cards. With each battle, you’ll get closer to becoming the next legendary OverKnight pilot!

name: Living with ghosts
description: This game was created for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2023. It's part of the same setting Lovewood, but you don't need pre-knowledge to understand and enjoy the story of Living With Ghosts.

name: Chaotix Pinball
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pac-Man Brothers
description: The Pac-Man Brothers is an unofficial sequel/reboot of the original Pac-Man games in the arcade. New things include procedurally generated levels, simultaneous multiplayer, a new dodge roll move, and more!

name: When Trees Turn to Ice
description: This game was created for the Winter VN Jam 2022. It's a spinoff to Lovewood, but you don't need pre-knowledge to understand and enjoy the story of When Trees Turn to Ice.

name: Hood Ninja
description: How long can you survive in the hood? Hood Ninja is an intense, fast-paced third-person fighting game that throws you into the heart of a gritty neighborhood where survival is the only thing on your mind. The player will face different adversities and opportunities to stay alive in the streets.

name: Frightwood
description: Frightwood is a visual novel created over the course of a month for the Spooktober VN Game Jam 2021. This story is a spooky prequel to Lovewood .

name: Invisible Seams
description: This story is a spinoff to my free fantasy dating sim Lovewood! However, you don't need any prior knowledge to understand and enjoy Invisible Seams.

name: Copper Odyssey 2
description: The world of Copper Odyssey returns! You play as an Angel named Celeste who must touch 30 paintings to bring color back to them. This is a press-turn JRPG that takes place in a museum. Respect the craft and yourself by fighting against the living artworks who want to make you one of their own.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2
description: "Cardfight!! Vanguard," has newly come to digital game! Over 3,000 cards for the Standard format! A brand-new original story shares the world of anime series unfolds! Enjoy your own cardfight experience!!

name: The Crown Saga: Pi’s Adventure
description:
In an era when the Demon King reigned over all, lived a wolf girl named Pi.

But all of a sudden... She was chosen by the Crown?!

It shall now be Pi's destiny to become a legendary knight and save Natureland.

Will Pi be able to complete her quests and turn into a legendary knight so she can bring back peace...?

name: Edenfall
description: Edenfall is the next instalment to the Seraphim Slum universe. Playing the previous game is recommended, but not required to understand Edenfall.

name: Gluttony Gods
description: A liminal game about love, apotheosis and rot.

name: Mortal Coil
description: A reality TV cyberpunk death game: if you die in game, you die in real life!

name: Fractured Worlds
description: Search for loot, power and answers about a broken, fragmented world in this overhead action RPG with procedural zones and unique multiplayer features.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ta 152 H-1 Collector Plane
description: The Ta 152 was the last creation of the German aircraft designer Kurt Tank, which managed to take part in combat operations during the Second World War. This aircraft was the culmination of the evolution of the Fw 190 fighter and Germany's most advanced piston fighter. It was in development for a long time, several years, and appeared at the very end of the war. During the development, several modifications of the original Fw 190 were produced, which finally led to the Ta 152 - the name "Fw" was changed to "Ta" in recognition of the designer's merits.

name: Battleshots: Chaos Edition
description: Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, as for every attack could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

name: Everspace 2: Alienware Ship Skin
description: Download this DLC for a free Alienware ship skin in EVERSPACE 2.

name: Naomi Clicker: Premium DLC
description: Play the premium map ‘Seasons'!

name: Apocalypse Secrets
description: You will have to explore the devastated world after a global catastrophe in search of various items. In this 3D arcade in genre "find and click" you need to flying across the map, you will be searching for different objects.

name: Vanity: Weapon Pack
description: This DLC contains 28 weapon skins.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Havoc Over the Kuban Campaign
description: This campaign focuses on a fictitious, but historically plausible A-20 Boston, or "Havoc" squadron flying interdiction missions against the over-extended German supply lines.

name: Cursed Apartment
description: You wake up in your apartment's room. A stranger's voice from voice-recorder tells you that you're trapped in a cursed apartment, infested with anomalies.

name: Terra Inferno
description: Humans are ruining the lush world of Terra Inferno! Embody nature's wrath in this Turn-Based Tactics meets Resource Management Game, evoke natural calamities to devastate the human onslaught!

name: Screw Drivers: Supporter Pack
description: If you want to support us and the development of Screw Drivers, you can purchase this Supporter Pack which includes four special materials to color your vehicles, a confetti cannon and a license plate.

name: Flatspace: Music Pack 2
description: 9 new in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace. Like any in-game music for Flatspace, these will trigger at random when you enter a new sector.

name: Horror Manor
description: Step into the decaying halls of Horror Manor, an abandoned estate shrouded in mystery. With a sudden click, the doors slam shut, trapping you within its chilling embrace.

name: Punch!
description: Punch! is a clicker Game, in which you click fruit to make a proper glass of Punch! In Punch! you click fruit to gain even more Punch!

name: Bounty of One: Panic in the Mines
description: The Undertaker has escaped through the Mines! Face the danger of the abandonned tunnels, beware of landslides and goblin-driven minecarts and bring the necromancer to justice. 3 new characters, 30 new objects, 17 new achievement, get ready to rumble!

name: Angel Legion: Chain Trace - Orange
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: System Reject
description: System Reject is an exciting sci-fi role-playing game set in an underground laboratory overrun by zombies and robots. Explore and fight for survival with limited resources. Customize weapons, upgrade skills, and engage in intense combat.

name: My Sudoku
description: Beginners, casual players and experts will find an enjoyable challenge in My Sudoku. Solve puzzles at your own pace in a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere.

name: My Sudoku: Classic 4x4 Easy 10
description: Add 30 new Sudoku puzzles to your game.
