name: Mama's Sleeping Angels
description: Kiss and decapitate your friends in a Co-Op horror game about collecting cursed objects to feed to a deity called Mama, lest she hunger for you. Work together, and betray each other... Anything to keep Mama happy.

name: Sonic Chaos Remake
description: A fan-made remake of Sonic Chaos by Laiker_2003

name: Phantom Tank
description: Bootleg of "Tanks But No Tanks" (aka Phantom Panzer)

name: My Sudoku: Classic 9x9 Medium 2
description: Add 30 new Sudoku puzzles to your game.

name: Misterious Thief
description: A Bootleg of "Mysterious Thief"

name: Undercover
description: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?

name: Journey to Kreisia
description: Blazing a new trail in classic RPGs, Journey to Kreisia is bound to please fans of the genre with plenty of engaging features such as hunting for hidden treasures, testing one's strength in challenging battle arenas, and taking up a variety of subquests! Customize the fighting technique by raising weapon levels, equipping various orbs, and using extremely handy monster guide when in need of more information to perfect your battle skills!

name: Bloody Aria
description: Sin descripción

name: Fling with a Tiefling
description: Fling with a Tiefling is a short fantasy romance visual novel that follows you, an adventurer whose journey is about to come to an end. With tonight potentially being the last night with your treasured Tiefling companion Karrus, how will you spend it with him?

name: Super Mario Bros. 3 Advance
description: Sin descripción

name: Aventura de Luigi
description: Sin descripción

name: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing
description: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing is a fangame created by Lu9 starring Luigi as the main protagonist.

name: Nightmare's Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Squares
description: Channel your 4 corners and start aiming! Battle squares is an online 8 directional 2D Shooter. Pick your weapons, colored identity and embody the 4 corners! Tumble, Bounce, Recoil and FIGHT!

name: Boku no Saiai no
description: The story of the timid, quiet, and gentle Sara, and the assertive Yura who loves him. Sara is a medical student, and he depends on Yura in his daily life. Sara finally has some free time to take a break, and he spends it with Sara, but... They both hold dark feelings within them, and wish this time would last forever.

name: Rakudo yo Ori he
description: Ren Kijirushi is captured by a strange religious group that dwells in a village deep within the mountains and is made their "God". So begins his new life within a prison, taken care of by a boy named Takumi Natsume. Until a few years ago, Tatsumi himself had borne the title of "God", and he hates Ren for currently holding the position.

name: Touching Cloth At The End Of Time
description: 7 brand new detailed Limit Removing maps for Doom 2, made using Stock textures only. The premise is simple...kill the hoards of demons and escape. There's just one small problem...you're touching cloth. Better get moving before the unthinkable happens. As you massacre the hoards, you ask yourself the burning question...."should farts have lumps in them?"

name: Tales from Mars
description: Tales from Mars is a collection of 2 maps based on E1M1, a classic Knee Deep in the Dead ﻿ma﻿p and E1M2 with latter leaning more into﻿ The Shores of Hell. It's got all the monster types and a couple of traps that will hopefully stress you a bit.

name: Semper Fidelis
description: Semper Fidelis is a collection of 3 maps for Doom II that use plenty of Boom trickery to make this poor marine's hostile experience even more interesting.

name: Enchantress of the Sea
description: Enchantress of the Sea is a 4-map themed miniwad for Boom with a water temple aesthetic style. The gameplay is varied, as it combines linear, sandbox and fight-oriented maps.

name: Hermeticism
description: Hermeticism is a 9-Map wad for Heretic that replaces Episode 1.

name: Coffee Please
description: Become a cozy coffee shop owner. Manage inventory, set prices, take payments, pet the cat, expand, and decorate your venue to build the best coffee house. Enjoy the charm of a heartwarming cafe simulator!

name: The Everlasting Lovestory at the Windcap
description: I was abandoned by the world, and she was forgotten by time. Attracted by loneliness, we cling to each other because of misfortune. The happy fairy tale woven by the two eventually turned into a curse of despair.

name: Cycles of Aylorea
description: Cycles of Aylorea is a survival simulation game set in the medieval era. Imagine expansive city building!

name: Mega Man Rocks!
description: Mega Man Rocks! is a Mega Man fan game created by Eric Ruth via Game Maker and released in April 2009. This game is slightly different from regular Mega Man games, for example, Mega Man can crouch to avoid enemy attacks. Some of the Robot Masters are immune to an uncharged buster shot, making things slightly more complicated.

name: Monster Hunter Outlanders
description: A new Monster Hunter title for mobile, more similar to the classic series formula.

name: Santa
description: A 1-4 player co-op Christmas horror game. You have 3 days to deliver the presents and save Christmas, or die trying.

name: GtaGuessr
description: Gtaguessr - Like geoguessr but in GTA. Based in the world of Los Santos figure out where Franklin is taking selfies in Grand Theft Auto 5's world.

name: Relics of Aurelia
description: An rpg that makes various things called relics have a good side and a bad side. You have to discover what they do, and use them to beat the game!

name: Shroud of Gloom
description: Shroud of Gloom is a point-and-click horror game. Solve puzzles, collect items and uncover secrets with nothing but a flickering flashlight to guide your way. Can you survive the dark and make it out alive?

name: Squadron: Ghost
description: Squadron: GHOST is a total conversion mod for Half-Life that was being developed in the early 2000s, inspired by anime, manga, and cyberpunk aesthetics. However, the mod's development was canceled at the time. Despite this, it still impresses considering the era in which it was being developed. There is little information available online about this mod.

name: Golden Tides
description:
Set sail in Golden Tides, a fast-paced PvP pirate Adventure MOBA where teams of four race to hunt for treasure. Engage in thrilling ship battles, fight across dynamic terrains, and experience a new adventure every time you set sail.

In Golden Tides, your legacy is forged not just by the treasures you claim but by the choices you make. With true ownership of your achievements, set forth to make your mark on the world. Chart your course, face the unknown, and become the ultimate pirate legend.

name: Hidden Cats: Thief
description: "Hidden Cats : Thief" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find one hundred cute cozy cats located on the map.

name: Cat Trip
description: Our cute cats have lost their treasures and need you to recover them. It's a magical world of cats and picturesque lands with unique sights. Help cats find lost items in Ice World, Sandtown, and many more places. Enjoy the delightful combination of discovery and destressing.

name: Hidden Cats In ButtonWood Street
description: Find cute cats in Buttonwood Street. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Linked
description: Explore past and future, high and low in this short platformer game!

name: The Cursed Ritual
description: The Cursed Ritual is a horror genre FPS game about a person who gets stuck in the middle of the forest in midnight as his car crashes. With no signal in midnight he wanders through the forest finding a shelter to pass the night and finds an abandoned house. Explore the secrets of the haunted house.

name: MeiQi 2024
description: Meiqi Mystery 2024 is a narrative puzzle game and the latest installment in the MeiQi series. Liu Qingchun, the bureau chief, personally takes charge of investigating the cases of the 403 Intelligence Division. This season presents you with six unique cases to solve.

name: Whole Note
description: A casual card game where you use note cards and various items to combine cards and create Whole Note Cards.

name: Puzzle Player
description: Dive into a seductive tile-based puzzle game where you slide, rotate, and match tiles to unveil stunning images of nudes. Each challenge blends strategy and creativity, making it an enticing experience for puzzle lovers. Unlock your passion and indulge in this captivating journey of art and allure!

name: Arcade Archives: Vs. The Quest of Ki
description:
"VS. The Quest of Ki" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988.
The objective of the game is to recover the BLUE CRYSTAL ROD that has been stolen by DRUAGA.
The main character, KI, is controlled to reach the top of the tower where monsters are roaming around.

name: City::Ephemera
description:
Explore the hazy::temporality of city::ephemera

A short experience inspired by artists Yayoi Kusama and photographer Hiroshi Sugimoto. The experience will end after 7 minutes::20 seconds.

name: Wittle Mistakes
description: Wittle Mistakes is a mechanics-based third-person 3D adventure where players navigate the trials of infancy within the Mother Corporation. Unveil the dark secrets that Mother has been hiding. The playpen awaits!

name: Pocket Mystery EP DX
description: A surreal, short-form puzzle adventure / horror game built for the GameBoy, POCKET MYSTERY EP DX updates the original POCKET MYSTERY EP with full color graphics, re-designed puzzles, updated music and sound effects, and additional content.

name: Bloxcalibur
description: Find your sword, and press the space bar to swing it. Your goal is to run, jump, and slash your way to the portal in each level.

name: Resident Evil: Seamless HD Project
description: Time to re-experience this classic survival-horror game with Machine Learning upscaled backgrounds, seamless masks and many other small improvements in this all-in-one texture pack.

name: Resident Evil 2: Seamless HD Project
description: Time to re-experience this classic survival-horror game with Machine Learning upscaled backgrounds, seamless masks and many other small improvements in this all-in-one texture pack

name: Resident Evil 3: Nemesis - Seamless HD Project
description: The Seamless HD Project is an upscaled, restored and in some cases manually edited remaster that brings old environments, visual effects and game elements into sharper detail.

name: A Kristus Story: A Night Market Holiday Tale
description: It's the most wonderful time of the year and Yule is in full swing within the Night Market. Join your choice of characters during the festive season and unlock the secrets of Kristus within Artisan Alley. Will you show compassion? Will you understand the motives behind the season? Or will you kill a snowman? It's all up to you in this 87k interactive short.

name: Jelly Truck
description:
Ever wondered what it would be like to steer a truck through a jelly-filled world? Well, wonder no longer, Jelly Truck is here.
Drive your Jelly Truck across all the obstacles to complete each level. Aim is to get the Jelly Truck to the finish flag to level up.

Can you drive your wobbly jelly truck all the way to the flag at the end of each level? You will have to roll and jiggle your way across the many obstacles along the way. Everything is made of jelly, so this truck driving game is quite challenging! Good luck!

Fantastic driving game, in which you are driving the truck made of… jelly! This wiggling vehicle is quite tricky to drive, so drive carefully and get to the finish line as quickly as possible.

Get behind the wheel and try to reach the end of each level! Everything in this world has been made out of jelly, which can make it quite hard to get past certain obstacles.

name: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective
description: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective is a game where a detective must explore around, rewind people's testimonies, and find clues to pin their own crime onto someone else.

name: Advanced T-Robots
description: Sin descripción

name: Ata: Extracts from the American Civil War
description: Unofficial fan-remake of the DOS game North & South

name: Islets Defense
description: Islets Defense is a turn-based tower defense game where you build a small village to earn resources and defend your castle.

name: Quake Upstart Mapping Project 2017
description: QUMP is a project designed to get newcomers into mapping for Quake. Most of the mappers involved had never made a Quake map before, or had only made a few. Some of the maps are more seasoned mapper's first attempts from long ago. Ten small to large levels in varying themes/styles and a start hub map to access each of them.

name: Pocket Mystery EP
description:
Explore a strange hotel and try to uncover the truth behind a mysterious murder as Detective Walker Rylance.

Talk to the hotel staff and guests while reliving the final moments of the victim(s) in this surreal horror adventure game. Oh, there are block puzzles too.

name: Limestone
description: 3 industrial-themed maps for doom2

name: Conscience
description: Jack Beckham is found dead, hanging in his apartment alone. Police rule it a suicide. His father, refusing to accept the conclusion, hires you to investigate. Delve into the clues left behind in his apartment to discover what really happened.

name: Hollow Doll
description: Hollow Doll is a first-person survival horror game set in a post-humanity earth inhabited by remnant "doll" life. Follow the elusive netdiver, Cel, as she chases after the whispers of a dead network known as the Red_Sea. Explore dystopian megastructure locales and exorcise the corrupted ghosts of drowned netdivers bleeding from the Red_Sea.

name: Sivi's Factory
description: Sivi's Factory is a single player first-person horror game in which you play as Felix. You are looking for your brother on the scientific factory. Solve puzzles on the locations, explore new rooms, fight your enemy and go deeper into factory.

name: Bubbelsche Deluxe
description:
In Bubbelsche Deluxe you must navigate a small bubble through a long, complicated maze without colliding on the game blocks. Manage the bubble as fast and wide as possible without bursting.
You have exactly one attempt per game to make it.

name: Mind Loop
description: Enter the endless hall where reality distorts. Spot anomalies, correct them, and uncover the dark truth—miss one, and you may be lost forever.

name: Criss Cross Bomb
description: Sin descripción

name: Rev Grav
description: Sin descripción

name: Suika Animal Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Mars Farce
description: Sin descripción

name: The Glory of America
description: The Glory of America is an action-packed game where you run through New York as Mr. President, armed and ready to fend off zombies. Complete various mini-missions, collect points, and enjoy stunning graphics, intelligent zombie AI, and a beautifully depicted New York City.

name: Bust a Block 2
description:
From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Bust a Block". In this expansion you can expect 25 new, tricky levels in which the aim is to destroy cleverly arranged blocks with just one shot!

What can you expect in "Bust a Block 2"?

Challenging puzzle gameplay: Every action counts! Find the perfect angle and place your shot strategically to destroy all the blocks at once.

25 cleverly designed levels: Experience an ever-increasing challenge where each level surprises you with increasingly complicated block formations.

Tactics and skill: Think carefully about how you place your shot - one mistake and the blocks will stop! Will you master all the levels?

Can you make the perfect shot and destroy all the blocks in one go? Prove your skill and become the master in "Bust a Block 2"!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia
description:
Immerse yourself in the serene and satisfying world of Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia, a game designed for relaxation and mental engagement. This virtual jigsaw experience offers thousands of stunning puzzles with themes ranging from scenic landscapes and vibrant wildlife to intricate abstract art.

Choose your difficulty by adjusting the number of pieces, from beginner-friendly sets to expert-level challenges. The game’s intuitive interface makes placing pieces seamless, with features like automatic sorting, hints, and progress tracking. Enjoy soothing background music and customize your workspace for an even more immersive experience.

Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia caters to all puzzle lovers, providing endless hours of calm and joy.

name: Ramp Bike Racing
description: Can you master the ramps and become the ultimate racing champion?

name: Jungle Adventure
description: Dive into Jungle Adventure, a pixel platformer where you explore vibrant jungle landscapes, dodge obstacles, and face off against quirky creatures. Overcome challenging obstacles, battle quirky jungle creatures, and uncover hidden treasures as you progress through vibrant levels. With intuitive controls, retro-style pixel art, and a dynamic soundtrack, each stage offers unique platforming challenges and hidden secrets to discover.

name: Spot The Difference: Christmas Edition
description: Celebrate the holiday season with Spot The Difference: Christmas Edition, brought to you by the original creators of the globally beloved Spot The Difference amusement machine game!

name: VolleySmash
description: Fast-paced 3D volleyball game, perfect for casual gamers, competitive players, and volleyball fans

name: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons
description: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons redefines sports gaming with its groundbreaking first-person volleyball experience. Offering realism and immersion, it brings every aspect of real-life volleyball to your screen with unmatched precision. From powerful spikes to insane digs, it mirrors every court move.

name: Heart of a Knight
description: Sin descripción

name: Reel Fishing: Days of Summer
description: Your Ultimate Fishing Trip Awaits!

name: Megaton
description: Sin descripción

name: Spaceman Wakes Up In A New World, The Government Has Been Experimenting On People On the Moon and Created Crazy Vine Monsters
description: a Difficult Rogue-Like about a spaceman trapped on the moon where Crazy Vine monsters run rampant.

name: Brain Test: Tricky Puzzles
description: Brain Test is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers. Different riddles and tricky tests will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and bring your new brain-pushing experience!

name: Tormented Soul
description: High Stakes PvPvE—blending MOBA, Sandbox, and MMO progression elements. AOE skill based action combat, seasonal gear progression, loadouts, seamless combat-gathering, partial loot PvP—item corruption & cleansing system, and risk-boosted RNG. Ascend 51 ranks—become a Time Slayer.

name: More Lies
description: Heavily inspired by Yume Nikki and Don't Hug Me I'm Scared, the content in M o RE Lie s centers specifically around playing as an antisocial adolescent who calls himself Henry, as he traverses the many diverse worlds that are laid out before him. His main objective, however, is to search for the four "Lies"; simply put, four people (including Henry himself) who have an apparent significance which cannot be explained by traditional methods. These important figures are hidden amongst the many various locales, and it is your job, as the player, to of course encounter them and add such beings to your roster. Along the way you, the player, may find yourself learning a little about your own existence, as well as discovering the "true meaning of the universe". And we are afraid this is the only way of going about doing so. Nonetheless, we have decided to let the opportunity to be yours, that is, if you have the desire to help such a story transpire. You have the ability to make that decision now...

name: Glow Storm
description: Wield a powerful shield in this neon-lit 2D bullet hell where timing is everything. Destroy enemies with strategic shield activations and harvest their sparks as allies. Master the balance between offense and defense in vibrant arenas, then challenge yourself in Hard Mode for the ultimate test.

name: Burgie's Cozy Kitchen
description: A relaxing kitchen game. Manage your burger joint restaurant: minimize the game in the corner of your desk while you do your business and wait for new orders. It can also connect to your Twitch chat to welcome your viewers.

name: King's Quest V: Absence Makes The Heart Go Yonder!
description: A stripped down version of the PC game of the same name. Changes include severely reduced visual fidelity, the removal of any voice acting, along with heavy censorship due to Nintendo of America's strict guidelines.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Tokyo
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Tokio landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: HeartWeaver
description: Help Ace reconnect with her emotions in this 3D puzzle-platformer adventure game alongside Mark, a loudmouth magic tome. Explore the worlds of Ace's mind, solve puzzles using the abilities of her emotions and recover her memories. Guide her to make the decisions that'll take her to healing inside.

name: One More Plate
description: Sin descripción

name: Lythe The Forgetful Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Cretion
description: Spin-off of Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin, the game will tell a spin-off story focused on the brilliant Princess Kokorowa, Sakuna’s close friend, who is a high-ranking goddess presiding over wheels and inventions from her heavenly home.

name: Green Heights
description: In this vertical precision platformer, run, jump, and climb your way through challenging obstacles with satisfying and tight controls. Navigate through atmospheric terrarium vegetation and uncover hidden paths. Perfect for fans of skill-based platformers—every fall is your fault!

name: Ricave
description: Ricave is a turn-based, first-person dungeon crawler inspired by the wild nature of traditional roguelikes and designed around readability, intuitive mechanics, and transparency.

name: Hidden Cats of Egypt
description: Discover 100+ hidden cats in ancient Egypt's beautiful scenes. A relaxing hidden object game blending feline charm with Egyptian mystery.

name: Limscape
description: A first-person exploration game where you walk through eerie and realistic spaces, searching for an exit. Powered by Unreal Engine's Lumen, it's perfect for those who enjoy quiet walks or simple games. Use the sandbox feature to create your own space! Requires a DirectX12-compatible GPU.

name: The Greatest Chef
description: Sin descripción

name: HeartFinder
description: Hi! Can you find 50 little hidden hearts?

name: Tim 7 Français-Maths 4e
description: A bundle of the two Tim 7 games with the 4e level of French and mathematics released under Pointsoft's Tempo series.

name: Magikoopa Security Force
description: Magikoopa Security Force is a new take on the Tower Defense genre - instead of constructing towers to stop generic enemy units, one must strategically place Minions-Bowser's minions, that is-in a level to stop a decidedly nonuniform onslaught of Shy Guys. It is as much a game of Tower Defense as it is a game of action, as the Magikoopa you control is just as capable of defeating attackers as one's minions. Casting offensive spells and summoning aid requires time, and the determined Shy Guys don't give you any time between waves to relax. After clearing a stage, one is awarded coins and a rank, based on the amount of coins remaining from the mission.

name: The Legend of Zelda: New Beginnings
description: Sin descripción

name: Yan's World
description: Sin descripción

name: Birdo vs. Macintosh
description: Join BIRDO on a quest unlike any other: a mission to stop the evil Steve Jobs from sullying the good name of Windows 95 (and the soon to be released Windows 98) using a smear campaign that goes far and wide across the vast landscapes of Silicon Valley. It's up to you, a lowly pink Birdo named "Birdo", to stop the antics of the recently reestablished CEO before things are too late in Computer Land, 1997.

name: Pac-Man Megamix
description: Sin descripción

name: Toad's Typical Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Warcraft I: Remastered
description:
Journey back to the beginning of a 30-year legacy with the first Warcraft story created in 1994, now remastered with vivid, all-new visuals and modernized controls!

Experience the inciting war between Orcs and Humans that shook Azeroth to its core. Defend the realm as the noble Alliance, or seek to conquer it as the bloodthirsty Horde across thrilling faction campaigns or custom skirmish games. Whichever side you take, there has never been a better time to charge into the legendary battles of Azeroth’s greatest heroes in the Warcraft universe

name: Warcraft II: Remastered
description:
Captain your own fleet in the second Warcraft title created in 1995, now remastered with vivid, all-new visuals and modernized controls!

War between orc and humans rages on across the seas, and the fate of the world hangs in the balance as the great tacticians of the Horde and the Alliance clash. Only one thing is certain: winning this war will demand unprecedented cunning, courage, and nerves of steel.

name: Smashed and Boiled
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Point
description: Welcome to Rogue Point, a 4 player, cooperative shooter. Team up with friends and build an elite tactical team. Plan and execute challenging missions in a dynamic Rogue-Lite structure with hundreds of ways to play.

name: Ghunter
description: GHUNTER is a 3rd person action-adventure, twin-stick shooter game about cooking your prey... ALIVE!!

name: Furious Bikers
description: Tighten up your gloves and warm your engines!

name: Forbidden Love
description: Guide two souls in an impossible love story. Your decisions will lead them to happiness or tragedy. Their fate is in your hands!

name: Battleminer Giants
description: Step into a breathtaking voxel open world from the creator of BattleminerZ, where towering giants, forged from the landscape itself, roam the land shaping the fate of kingdoms.

name: Konbini Baito to Stalker
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman 5: Double Jumper
description:
Rockman 5: Double Jumper is a hack that features a new skill for Rockman, the Double Jumper (press the jump button on mid-air to perform it, like Forte and Zero).

The hack also features:

- new level designs
- new boss move patterns
- new weapons behavior

name: Digimon World 2 Alternative
description:
Digimon World 2 Alternative aims to be a new Digimon World 2 experience for both seasoned veterans of the game, as well as newer players!

Features:

Story and dialogue edited to reinterpret events
New Digimon to recruit and Digivolve into (Including DNA-Digivolution!)
Brand new domains to explore with new layouts
Digimon Skill AP, MP cost, and effects are refactored
Menu and Battle UI redone to support complete Digimon Skill information
Digimon Re-name Attendant in Coliseum allows renaming of Digimon
…and more!

name: Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase
description:
Soar to new heights in Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase! Experience the adrenaline of high-speed aerial racing with intuitive controls supporting both PS4 and Xbox controllers. Race against friends in thrilling split-screen multiplayer, or challenge yourself in a variety of game modes.

Explore expansive environments in Free Roam mode, compete in the exciting Championship, or push your limits in Time Trial challenges. With diverse tracks and stunning visuals, every race promises a unique adventure!

Customize your aircraft for peak performance and style, and climb the leaderboards to prove you’re the ultimate Flight Master. Whether you're a casual flyer or a fierce competitor, Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase offers endless fun for everyone.

Join the race today and become a legend in Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase! Download now and take off!

name: Skycards
description: Sin descripción

name: Castlevania
description: Sin descripción

name: Cats are Cute: Pop Time!
description: Have you ever found something so cute you just wanted to squeeze it until it popped! Well now you can, with Cats are Cute: Pop Time!. Combine the cats to make an even bigger cat! How many new cats will appear? Blow off steam by pop pop popping cats and aim for the high score!

name: Clone Drone in the Hyperdome
description: Cut robots apart in VR. Feel your sword disintegrate their metal bodies. Now you live and die in the Crashloop, a roguelike tournament to the death. Lock swords! Shoot shurikens from your wrist! This is CLONE DRONE... in the HYPERDOME!!!

name: Castlevania
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Mess with Gamers
description: A new survival horror game

name: Castlevania
description: Sin descripción

name: Heal The Survivors
description: A horde survival game where the object is to keep moving and stay awake to heal the hordes of patients chasing you.

name: Escaping Agent
description: The AMP mansion has never been crazier in Escaping Agent! Agent00 has lost his precious hats, and he’s gone off the rails. Your mission? Collect them all while avoiding a very angry—and very determined—Agent. Fail, and you’ll be in for quite the surprise. Succeed and you’ll save the day by bringing Agent back to his senses!

name: Happy Hotel
description: Happy Hotel is a mildly horror-themed game where you descend through creepy, handcrafted floors filled with traps, puzzles, and eerie surprises. With randomized challenges and Happy, the sinister mascot, your goal is to escape the hotel. Playtime: 15 mins to 2 hours.

name: Akumajou Dracula
description: The first J2ME port of Castlevania, released exclusively for Japanese cellphones.

name: The Kharzov Effect
description: Welcome to The Kharzov Effect, an immersive first-person puzzle horror game. Explore Dr. Kharzov’s eerie estate as you unravel the mystery behind a series of abductions. Face terrifying creatures, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the truth of Kharzov's dark history!

name: These Darker Tides
description: Welcome [EMPLOYEE] to your new job protecting Deep Sea Cables from creatures of the deep. We're not liable for loss of limbs, sanity, or life while on the job. Don't forget to keep your desk clean and your eyes on those cameras!

name: AquaDark
description: AquaDark is a first-person horror game with management elements set in the ‘80s. As an aquapark owner, players have to serve customers, sell wares, record everything, and solve the mystery behind strange events in the aquapark.

name: Dreamcore95 Idle
description: Dreamcore inspired incremental game with vaporwave aesthetics

name: Castlevania
description: An enhanced J2ME version for mobile phones.

name: X-Blades: HD Upgrade
description: The all new X-Blades HD Upgrade features updated graphics and wide-screen compatibility, as well as newly rendered and post processed cutscenes in Full HD.

name: Family Farm
description: Family Farm is an online farming game that allows players to build and develop their own farm using intuitive mechanics and friendly graphics.Starting with a small farm, players need to take care of their farms through planting and harvesting crops, feeding animals, and constructing machines.

name: Akumajou Dracula
description: Final enhanced mobile version released exclusively in Japan for the i-Mode cell service.

name: Pocket Legend
description: In Pocket Legend, a roguelike deck-builder, you control a hero transported to a world of legendary weapons. Strategically arrange items in your inventory to defeat enemies with unique attack patterns. Customize your setup, unlock powerful cards, and uncover the fate of the dark forces.

name: Warcraft III: Reforged - Version 2.0
description: In celebration of the 30th anniversary of the release of Warcraft: Orcs & Humans, Warcraft III: Reforged has been updated to version 2.0, which includes many fixes, improvements, and nods to Warcraft’s history.

name: Warcraft Remastered Battle Chest
description: Celebrate 30 years of Warcraft history and travel back to the beginning with remastered versions of Warcraft I and II and a newly updated Warcraft III Reforged.

name: Hearthstone: The Great Dark Beyond
description: Long ago, the distant planet Argus was attacked by the demonic Burning Legion. While most of Argus gave in to unholy promises of power, some brave souls escaped to the stars. These “exiled ones” now call themselves Draenei, and they need you to help them find a new home. Pilot your own Starship and explore the vastness between worlds in The Great Dark Beyond!

name: Hearthstone: Into the Emerald Dream
description: Into the Emerald Dream is Hearthstone's 29th expansion, set to release as the first expansion of 2025. This expansion explores the Emerald Dream, as the battle between the Old Gods and the Druids of the Emerald Dream decides the fate of the World Tree.

name: Hearthstone: The Shrouded City
description: The Shrouded City (working title) is Hearthstone's 30th expansion, set to release as the second expansion of 2025. This expansion is stylized as the first-ever sequel expansion, following the events of Journey to Un'Goro. Players join Elise on a hunt for a mythical, lost Tortollan city.

name: Hearthstone: The Heroes of Time
description: The Heroes of Time (working title) is Hearthstone's 31st expansion, set to release as the third expansion of 2025. In this expansion, players travel with Chromie through alternate realities to recruit Legendary Warcraft heroes.

name: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within - Undermine(d)
description: Sin descripción

name: Gregory Horror Show: Lost Qualia
description:
Gregory Horror Show: Lost Qualia is a Gacha-based RPG mobile game that combines the elements of dungeon crawling with a Gacha card system. Lost Qualia uses the original 3D cube-esque graphics and style that the series is known for.

The Gameplay combines the elements of roguelike dungeon crawling with a Gacha card system and has the Player, Gregory, and various other playable characters navigating a randomized labyrinth, where they have to fight through hostile enemies which lurk within the dungeon. The player can use a variety of attacks, items, or Gacha cards to help them defeat enemies and complete the game's various levels. The primary objective is for the player to survive and reach the goal to complete the level.

name: Interstate 35
description: A visual novel exploring a near-apocalyptic vision of North Texas, told through the poetic words of a young woman going home.

name: Grimgig Railway
description: Grimgig Railway is a horror game with train simulation elements where you’ll need to keep calm and face your fears. You’ll drive the train across an old railway in Sakura valley, deep in the Japanese countryside. Drive the train and find soon enough why not everyone can keep this job.

name: Active Matter
description:
You’re an operative stuck in a time loop, always brought back from the dead to the same point.

Choose your loadout and enter quantum unstable zones rich with active matter — a substance capable of warping and ripping the very fabric of space and time.

Fight against rivals from other timelines, survive physics-breaking anomalies and try to stay alive. Harvest active matter, gather loot and extract to a safe place before the whole zone ceases to exist with everything inside it.

name: Jail Escape
description:
Jail Escape is a Half-Life 2 mod based off the television show "Prison Break". It somewhat follows the environments of the show. The developer made this mod to learn how to use different programs, such as Valve Hammer Editor and Maya.

Features:
- 1 new weapon
- 9 new maps
- Some new props and textures
- 30-60 min. playing time (depending on you skill level)

name: HoloReality
description:
This mod started from a chat session about learning to map and ways of improving.

The idea is to allow maps that are not normally released to be part of something bigger and that keeps growing.

It was original conceived for Half-Life 2 / Orange Box but could easily be extended to other single player games.

In retrospect it is clear that HoloReality was influenced by a Half-Life mod called Project Quantum Leap and Portal, although at the time of concept it didn’t seem that way.

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Götterdämmerung
description: Build the industrial and research foundation to survive the world’s greatest conflict In Hearts of Iron IV: Götterdämmerung. In this expansion, players can write new histories of Germany, Austria, Hungary, Belgium, and Congo. Pursue exciting new research and military options, opening new paths for devastating new weapons and dramatic raids on strategic targets.

name: Yard Resistance
description: Don't let the UFOs disturb your Yard. Eat their shield. Shoot them down.

name: Dragon Pet
description: On the snowy peaks of an ancient mountain you have found a magic dragon egg. All you have to do is to keep it at proper temperature, an it might hatch into a virtual baby pet with whom you can spend wonderful adventures by playing, training and taking care of your cute pet. Train a dragon and become creator of your own saga. Care for him and he will become your best, magic friend or simply ignore him and he will eventually run away, get sick or even die.

name: Need for speed: Mobile
description: At sunset in Hot Bay World, Ajie and Vera stood at the highest point of Hot Bay, looking at this endless racing paradise.

name: Portal: Alive & Kicking
description: Portal: Alive & Kicking is a full remake and re-imagining of Valve's award-winning title, Portal.

name: Portal: Ambition
description: Portal: Ambition is a semi-story-driven campaign that offers hours of gameplay through puzzles and out-of-bounds tasks. Complete requests by an unknown scientist from a different section of the facility, help retrieve important information and data.

name: Culinarium
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal: System Failure
description: Portal: System Failure is a community made standalone modification for Portal 2 built on the Source Engine, set within the Portal universe.

name: Dungeon Vending Machines
description: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!

name: Portal: Lost in Aperture
description: This is a mod for Portal 1. Includes new maps, storyline, a whole new Portal experience. This game take place in an Aperture laboratory in Eastern-Europe.

name: Portal: Singularity Collapse
description: Explore a new wing of Aperture Science focused on the creation of Portal Guns. Play as a scientist working at this research centre, and traverse it's remains after an unforeseen accident sends you forward in time. Go through never before seen areas with new technology in order to return.

name: The Broken Vow
description: Unravel the mystery by finding notes, objects and memories hidden around the house. Find out what happened to Clark, escape Emma and escape — even if it takes strength.

name: Pet Society Island
description: A Virtual Game Pet Game! Decorate your home, dress your pet, play minigames, decorate your own island! Go fishing, digging and much more!

name: Aftercare Sessions
description: Aftercare Sessions is a short episode dedicated to provide very easy maps. It features light combat, very easy exploration and snack-sized pace, with each map taking no more than 2 minutes. Just jump in and unwind a little.

name: Fallen Star
description: Jump and fight your way up through this vertical platformer through various short levels, and challenge yourself to keep up the combo's.

name: HertenHeld
description:
An exploration platformer where you play as a young huntress, that has to search for her lost deer pet, and save it from the hostile wolves that threatens the forest.

As you progress, you'll find items and weapons that helps you to open paths to other areas. Untill you'll meet the wolf boss, which will mark the end if defeated.

name: Dead Dock Protocol
description:
A neon-bloody action cyberpunk zombie shooter from Game Studio 1979.

Introducing Dead Dock Protocol, a thrilling cyberpunk zombie shooter packed with intense, neon-blood-soaked action! Embark on a crucial mission to rescue six besieged city zones from the clutches of Zombots and their formidable bosses. Whether you fight alongside your team or venture alone, your objective is to stay alive and eradicate the hordes of Zombots.

name: Oh My Wrench
description:
How long can you survive the road?

In Oh My Wrench, you’ll take the wheel in an endless car-driving adventure where the main goal is to survive as long as possible while dodging unpredictable obstacles. As you progress, the speed increases, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard that now features both all-time and weekly rankings, giving you fresh opportunities to shine every week!

To spice up the challenge, pick up bonuses along the way: grab an extra life to keep going, a time-slowing hourglass to catch your breath, or special coins to boost your score. Combined with a fast-paced day-night cycle and dynamic weather shifts, every moment feels fresh, thrilling, and filled with new surprises.

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!

name: Super Street Fighter II
description: The 16-bit conversion of Super Street Fighter II, while featuring graphical and sound concession compared to the arcade version, features game-play largely the same as the original, including the new game-play modes, and selectable game speed brought over from Turbo.

name: Gakuen Sentai Solblast
description: Sin descripción

name: Sainte-Vibrisse
description: A father and daughter set out for a peaceful camping holiday in the deep woods of rural Quebec. But when their car dies on a deserted road, their dream trip turns into a nightmare! No cell signal. No sign of life. Just an empty village, overrun with cats, strange happenings, and a supermarket that somehow… remains open despite no one inside. Are they truly alone? Or have they wandered into the heart of a dark and twisted cult? Sainte-Vibrisse awaits you… if you dare!

name: Map Map: A Game About Maps
description: Embark on a cozy treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Use your sense of direction to make maps, help your companions and explore idyllic islands.

name: Masquerade: Hell Academy
description:
The quiet Numata Hiroshi is being blackmailed by his classmate, Himehara Yoritake, into performing sexual acts for him. One day, Himehara orders Numata to steal the exam answers off the teacher's desk, which sets off a chain of events culminating in the two men being among the captives taken by a criminal impersonating a police officer.

Their captor demands increasingly depraved acts from his hostages, and if they're going to survive, they have no choice but to comply...

name: Purrrifiers: Cleaning Chaos
description: Purrrifiers is a hilarious 4-player co-op game about cleaning while causing chaos. Solve puzzles, drive quirky vehicles, use an array of cleaning tools and team up with adorable cats. Experience absurd humor, diverse locations, and non-stop fun as you collaborate or troll your way to cleaning glory!

name: Wildaria
description: Wildaria is an Action-Adventure RPG Pet Collector set in an Infinite Fantasy World. Explore diverse open-world biomes as you collect and train unique pets to aid in your quest to conquer dungeons, slay gods, or defend the natural world from the kingdom.

name: RetroBlazer
description: Take on the mantle of the Pyramid Guard, go up against the cybernetic Ark Legion, and rid the kingdom of a spectral blight. Combining the charm of Saturday Morning Cartoons and the bombastic action of late 90s shooters, RetroBlazer recaptures a golden era of frantic, fast-paced, first-person action.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Dead Space - Isaac Clarke Costume
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Santa Hat And Beard Costume

name: Moonsigil Atlas
description: The deckbuilding roguelike with tile-based mana. Strategically position powerful magic sigils, use tile adjacency to create overpowered combos, and seal away the Astral Titans to save the universe from calamity!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Sumo Wrestler Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Monkey King Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter V: Blanka
description: Sin descripción

name: Apricity
description:
The world grows cold, and the walls of your sanctuary begin to crumble under the weight of overwhelming darkness.
Gather soul energy and fortify yourself against sinister forces. Journey to find the light in the shadows, restore the garden and push back the night.

name: Street Fighter V: Cody Travers
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers
description: Sin descripción

name: Mad Shark
description: A flash game created by Scott Stoddard at Uniq Studios in 2001.

name: You Know The Drill
description: An action-puzzle game about a wannabe spelunker digging deep inside dangerous grounds.

name: Guardians of Altarris: The Sinless Blade
description: A lifetime of mystical combat training will be put to the test on this mission to save your home world of Altarris. A gorgeously animated epic with a cinematic aesthetic and soundtrack, Guardians of Altarris is one of those rare games that combines great graphics with an engaging story and addictive gameplay. Make the ultimate sacrifice to summon the Guardian and save Altarris!

name: Drums Rock: Undertale - 'Megalovania'
description:
Get the track 'Megalovania' from the Undertale game! This track is part of the Undertale DLC.

To gain access to the exclusive Undertale Scene and Skins, you must have the songs MEGALOVANIA and Hopes And Dreams.
Both songs are available through the Undertale DLC Bundle.

name: Random Quest
description:
Random Quest is a slightly experimental mod with an unusual story. It is not set inside the Half Life universe and there are some game mechanics which have been subtley altered. The pace starts out slow, and builds up gradually.

This mod is intended to be more of an adventure rather than a shooter. If you approach this mod as a pure shooter, then you will probably not enjoy it.

There are some intense action scenes, but most of these come later on, much of the earlier parts of the mod are focused on adventure and storytelling.

name: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers
description: Sin descripción

name: After Death
description: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...

name: Mario Royale Legacy
description: Mario Royale Legacy is an unofficial continuation of InfernoPlus' Mario Royale (2019)

name: Portal 2: Alive Again
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsuki no Hikari
description: A short yuri visual novel with several optional voice options for the protagonist.

name: Iron Trails: Outlaw Pursuit
description: Step into a semi-open world where your mission is to deliver supplies to stations while fending off bandits. Explore a vast, relaxing environment while engaging in shootouts or simply enjoying the scenery. Each delivery strengthens your country’s war effort. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Mister Antonio
description: A puzzle adventure game about a quirky cat with rather curious demands.

name: Multimind
description: Multimind is a relaxing game that tests the player's ability to multitask. Players need to maintain the stability of multiple game items at the same time and try to persist as long as possible as the game difficulty increases.

name: Void Lands
description: A fast-paced 2D action RPG where you play as a skilled archer battling through intense monster hordes, epic boss fights, and loot-rich arenas. Customize your abilities, find powerful gear, and master dynamic combat in a world filled with endless challenges and upgrades.

name: Meow Mission
description: Play Meow Mission and solve a variety of puzzles to rescue cats trapped in an outer dimension! The rescued cats will be brought to the Tomcat House, where you can make memories with their unique personalities. Let's go rescue these adorable kitties!

name: Arcane Chaos
description: Welcome to Arcane Chaos, built with Unreal Engine 5, a fantasy adventure that combines top-down 3D shooting and role-playing! Transform into a cute robot hero, defeat unique enemies, unlock a variety of guns and skill combinations, with light skill construction and roguelike elements.

name: Buddy Thunderstruck: The Maybe Pile
description: Champion truck-racing dog Buddy and his handyman ferret pal Darnell test potentially awesome (but mostly terrible) ideas in this interactive adventure.

name: Battle Kitty
description: Kitty and Orc brawl with monsters, beat out rivals — and need your help to move through Battle Island and become champion in this interactive adventure!

name: The Super Pie Throwing
description:
Princess Rosa is mad…. And her maids are gonna pay!!! After a tragic dessert mishap, everything falls apart.

The Super Pie Throwing is a slapstick action mini game where you throw pies, avoid weights, play red light green light, and all other sorts of things to earn HUGE POINTS!!! Try challenge mode for a variety of challenges and obstacles that change the core gameplay and push your skills! Or, if you want to just jump in for a quick match, try Time Attack and Score Attack!

30 unique challenges, various unlockables, funny faces, and more!!!
